title: Looks like OCE is horrible than NA
body:
Expect this is going to be downvoted and trolled, but as I made a post here - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/z5EQBjv0-gosh-oceania-people-are-so-rude-am-i-the-only-one-feel-this

 and saw other posts here, which Idk why happened to be OCE players posting, seems that the community DOES have kind of toxicity, and judging from the comments by some OCE players, I would at least not say they are "nice" people.

Again, this post is going to be "educated" by some trolls, but I'll just make it here for the sake of good community

replies.body: Having played since S2 mostly on NA because OCE wasn't around then I can confidently say OCE is far more toxic than NA.

Yeah i was till pre-season 2. NA WAS getting much more toxic but it seemed to slow down since the tribunal system. 

But OCE is RIPE with toxic players it seems. I Can't go a game without a real toxic player or team when i blind pick. Ranked is a LITTLE better but still you get the occasional person who gives up then blames everyone, or the hard core Toxic player who just cusses out your team or if not your team they talk sh*t to the enemy team and still end up tilting them self or their own team...

wait are you really going by just the people on the boards? thats ignorant and stupid.....but you happen to be right, we are the worst. we're a very liberal country so kids can run around doing whatever they want, especially on league where their parents cant see their edgy shit. we've also got the highest rate of bronze if you need a numbers statistic to back this up

Oce is toxic af but so are other servers. NA does seem better for levelling up as most new players are actually new and not smurfs. 

I mean, have you tried the russian or turkish servers? OMG so bad.

try the china server, it's really really really bad...
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

honestly... u think OCE players are rude?
try play on the China server (if u speak chinese ofcoz...
the standard there is just... sigh...

i don't know if it's luck or what
half the players i encounter are pretty nice 
which, the other half are levelling bots and some random toxic
i would say so far i am pretty happy with the community here
very friendly and helpful most of the time

but atm on OCE i am only lv20
no sure what it's like up the top
looks like na is horrible than oce england

Don't be mistaken; the boards community is only a very small percentage of the players and not necessarily representative of the whole. Trolls and malcontents, being what they are, are naturally more likely to use the boards then others, so there will always be a disproportionate amount of them participating on the boards compared to how many are playing in the region.

TL;DR - You might not get the same general reaction on the boards as you'd expect from in-game experience.
